description:
*** tran-go football THE 8-in-1 FOOTBALL (SOCCER) DICTIONARY WITH TRAVEL VOCABULARY ***

The football (US: soccer) dictionary tran-go football is a special edition of the travel dictionary tran-go 
dedicated to the special topic football and additionally enhanced by useful travel vocabulary.

tran-go football contains the following languages:

-English
-German 
-French 
-Spanish
-Italian
-Portuguese
-Russian
-Polish


Features:

-Universal app with innovatively adjusted portrait and landscape modes
-Specifically assembled vocabulary for the topic football 
-Total of over 7.500 entries in 8 languages 
-Additionally includes useful travel terms and phrases
-Yet another plus: Vocabulary completely offline, no Internet connection required 
-Simultaneous translation from the selected source language to all other 7 languages by one click
-Indication of the travel situation for each term (Everyday life, Gastronomy, Medicine, Tourism etc.)
-Ease of Use 
-Simplified input by auto completion of the search term 
-Quick source language change
-Localisation of the app for all available languages
